title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Blended Teaching Strategy Development for Remote Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning platforms and social studies knowledge at or above secondary education level
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement remote lesson designs combining asynchronous/synchronous strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can critically evaluate hybrid instructional materials applying the ANEKA concept (diverse learning activity approaches) at least three times.
Learners can revise and improve learning designs twice or more based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
